name: Monad 华语社群
fullText:
【從Foundry 到 Frontline: Opinion Labs在纽约的分享】  

来自全球的45位创始人齐聚 @monad_xyz 创业基地 @thestudio_xyz 共同参与一周 Foundry Event。这是一场为创业者打造、以实践为核心的深度加速体验。 

Monad Foundation真正重视的是：你的项目能否真正成功。
会议后，转化为成果才是关键。 https://t.co/L9SSkY0c2n

name: HackQuest
fullText:
Our Chengdu Meetup with @Mantle_Official was a huge success! 🎉

70+ builders joined for an afternoon of new insights on:

✅ Crypto-native banking
✅ AI execution layer
